revision.comment: Created page with "pre-oct-2018 == Trivia == * none * EXPIRED, AFAICT: There currently is a bug with the blue Special of this ship, where even a single counter can do upwards of 4,000 damage, ea..."
revision.text: pre-oct-2018 == Trivia == * none * EXPIRED, AFAICT: There currently is a bug with the blue Special of this ship, where even a single counter can do upwards of 4,000 damage, easily obliterating even Tier 3 ships the same level as the NCC-1701-B. ** Personal experience: *** with o0b1p0, bug did not activate... *** with o+b1-3p+, bug was active - levels 50 thru 96 *** with o5b5p5, bug reverted/is-different/doesnt-work - level 96 ** Since I am no longer encountering the bug, I cannot tell if the code has changed (unlikely, since the apk did not update) - or whether it is due to some subtle interactions of gameplay... ** The bug manifested independently of how-many-counters were left on the board (iirc) and indeed caused damage in chunks of mult-thousand-points (up to a high in the 4k-area... Like many bugs, it is probably due to an out-of-range error in the code... *** original-input had o3b1p3 ? (according to data-below) which i was unable to confirm... *** i was encountering the bug with b1, b2, and b3 (various o/p-levels) iirc... ** after selling and repurchasing the ship, i thought the bug was gone - but it has started to manifest again... *** it (bug) was not manifesting at o1b2p1, but when i noticed that an opponent was using it - i tracked their upgrades as o5b3p4... upgrading my ship to o1b3p1 activated it again... *** i am unclear on whether the bug manifests due to time-held (ie: multiple weeks?) or some other combination of factors... and again, the amount of damage is typically in the high-3k to mid-4k points... however, i did have it negated by an opponent who neutralized all special-gems, iirc... *** at this point, i will again upgrade the ship thru the lvl-96 series - but for now it (the bug) is manifesting at lvl-51 and o1-2b3p1... and even as a lvl-51 ship, it is killing most any lvl-91+ ships that i encounter... my baseline is up at lvl-96 again due to other-ships being at lvl-96... *** still manifesting at 2o3b4p at lvl-80 and lvl-90, never higher than 4.7K even when multiple-blue expirations... thought i mightve noticed lower (only in 3k-area) blasts as i upgraded o (to 2) when p was also at 2 - so am wondering if there is something about the 'difference' btwn o and p levels involved... whatever...

revision.comment: Created page with "pre-oct-2018 ==Trivia== Arden is one of the antagonists in the Event called [[Isolated Station]]. Inside the storyline, he is referred to as ''Antonio'' which might be a minor..."
revision.text: pre-oct-2018 ==Trivia== Arden is one of the antagonists in the Event called [[Isolated Station]]. Inside the storyline, he is referred to as ''Antonio'' which might be a minor mistake. Presumably Antonio is the first-name of the actor who sat for the costume-headshot.

pre-oct-2018 ==TRIVIA== [SPOILER ALERT] - * During the "Adrift" event, Terrhea is first encountered while apparently fleeing for his life. It is later revealed that he was using a derelict ship from the Battle of Cheron as a means to ignite a war between the Alliance and the Romulan Star Empire. * When he realizes that his plot has failed, Terrhea destroys his own ship, presumably perishing in the process. * Although it is not certain, it is possible that Terrhea was negatively affected by the derelict ship, which contained a psychoactive gas that would cause Romulans to go into a blind rage upon inhalation.

revision.comment: Created page with "pre-oct-2018 == Trivia == - Considering that Lt. Worf's R'uustai is an AoE (or Area of Effect) attack, this skill can be used to allow more powerful characters to launch p..."
revision.text: pre-oct-2018 == Trivia == - Considering that Lt. Worf's R'uustai is an AoE (or Area of Effect) attack, this skill can be used to allow more powerful characters to launch powerful attacks, making Lt. Worf a very dangerous Tier 1 character that can decimate teams with ease if not taken out early in the fight.
